text: Bhittako bheda yo ho ki yasa saharama du'ivata anatha balakaharu chan jasaka khajana yasa bhittamuni gadi'eka chan, ra tiniharuko babu bado asala manisa thiyo. Tasartha timro palanakartako iccha thiyo ki duvai anathaharule aphno tanneri avasthama a'era aphno yo sampatti timro palanakartako krpa ra dayale jhikun. Maile aphno svecchale tyo kama gareko ho'ina. Yo thiyo yi ghatanaharuko vastavika tathya jasabare tapa'ile dhairya garna saknubha'ena
